summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WanderLust AI Travel Planner. Frontend UI and form functionality working perfectly. Critical backend AI integration issue identified - OpenAI GPT-5.2 requests timing out consistently.

critical_bugs.issue: AI generation requests timeout after 60+ seconds. OpenAI GPT-5.2 via emergentintegrations library not responding within reasonable time
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks core app functionality - users cannot generate itineraries
critical_bugs.logs: LiteLLM completion() model= gpt-5.2; provider = openai - Retrying request to /chat/completions

integration_issues.issue: Form submission gets stuck in 'Generating...' state due to backend AI timeout

passed_tests: Homepage hero section displays correctly with background image
CTA button navigation to trip form
All form fields present and accessible (destination, dates, travelers, etc.)
Form field filling and dropdown selections
MongoDB connectivity and data persistence structure

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (all UI working, blocked by backend AI issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix OpenAI GPT-5.2 integration timeout issue. Verify EMERGENT_LLM_KEY validity, check network connectivity to OpenAI, or consider fallback AI provider. The emergentintegrations library requests are timing out consistently after 60+ seconds.
